frontmatter.title: Quick Setup
frontmatter.meta_title: MStore Pro - Complete React Native template for e-commerce
frontmatter.meta_description: BeoNews is an app that does magic for your website by converting your Wordpress website into mobile true native app with customized contents within a fillip.

markdownRemark.html:
Auto Install by using CeBuilder

The CeBuilder is the tools to help to install product easier without understanding about the React Native language or library setup. Please note that the beta version of CeBuilder is only support for the Expo version.

  • Download the CeBuilder free tool from: https://inspireui.com
  • See the Video Installing Guide: https://shrtm.nu/Nmgp
  • Unzip the download package from CodeCanyon, and open the project folder to run with CeBuilder

The App Builder feature:

  • Tools: to help for install all require libraries use for the React Native app

  • Verify purchased Code from Envato or Login to get all product list which purchased from InspireUI author

  • The Setup feature is used to input the main Website for your app, the Consumer Key/Secret keys is required to run the app. These setting is stored at App/common/AppConfig.json file.
  • Please make sure you config the website URL and Consumer Key correctly before going to next step, otherwise you can not use the app or get the error "can not get categories and tags".
  • This is the guide how to get the Consumer Key/Secret - https://docs.woocommerce.com/document/woocommerce-rest-api/

  • The Customization feature is used to custom basic info for the app:

If there is an issue the Customization could not be load which cause by the Wordpress config not correctly, please go to https://docs.mstore.io/basic-app-setting and check the Permalink URL setting from the Wordpress site
